    • Method Detail

      • getClan

        public ClanModel getClan()
        Returns the clan the player belongs to.
        Returns:
        a ClanModel object -
        null
        if the player is in no clan
        See Also:
        ClanModel

      • getLeague

        public League getLeague()
        Returns the league the player is currently in.
        Returns:
        a League object - null if the player is in no league
        See Also:
        League

      • getRole

        public java.lang.String getRole()
        Returns a String of the player's role in the clan he belongs to.
        Returns:
        member if the player has not been given any role in the clan
        admin if the player has been given the elder role
        coLeader if the player has been given the co-leader role
        leader if it is the leader of the clan

      • getAttackWins

        public java.lang.Integer getAttackWins()
        Returns how many attacks the player won during the current season.
        A won attack is an attack where the player earned at least 1 star.

        It does only include attacks from the main village.
        It does not include attacks from clan wars.
        Returns:
        an integer

      • getDefenseWins

        public java.lang.Integer getDefenseWins()
        Returns how many defenses the player won during the current season.
        A won defense is a defense where the attacker earned no star against your village.

        It does only include defenses from the main village.
        It does not include defenses from clan wars.
        Returns:
        an integer

      • getTownHallLevel

        public java.lang.Integer getTownHallLevel()
        Returns the current level of the player's townhall.

        Ranges from 1 to 13.
        Returns:
        an integer

      • getTownHallWeaponLevel

        public java.lang.Integer getTownHallWeaponLevel()
        Returns the current level of the player's townhall weapon.
        The townhall weapon level only concerns townhall level 13.

        Ranges from 1 to 5.
        Returns:
        an integer

      • getLegendStatistics

        public LegendStatistics getLegendStatistics()
        Returns a set of Season objects for players in Legend league.
        Returns:
        a LegendStatistics object - null if the player is not in Legend league
        See Also:
        LegendStatistics, Season

      • getTag

        public java.lang.String getTag()
        Returns the tag of the player.

        The tag is a unique identifier each player has, in the form of #AAAA00.
        It is displayed under the nickname on player's profile.
        Returns:
        a String

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the player.
        The name is the identity behind which you appear when you write in chat.
        Returns:
        a String
